name: SR3001 Alpha
description:
SR3001 is an open world, roguelike-inspired RPG. The game is currently in alpha, so bugs, mistakes, and incomplete aspects still exist.

Explore an alien world, kill monsters, and upgrade your body to survive the harsh planet.

I hope you will find the gameplay to be unique and engaging, and stick around as the game continues growing and improving.

Please download or read the manual, in addition to the game, as not all aspects of the game are effectively explained in-game.

Join the discord server to discuss the game with the devs.

Sad Note: The android version has some visual bugs :(
